TopicSection.Content:
Spread.Views provides the use of custom row template to customize the appearance of a row in Grid.

In Spread.Views, Row templates can be defined in 2 ways:

  • Using Raw String
  • Using Template Tag

Using Raw String: Here the template uses one single element defining absolute position for child element. Absolute postion of child enables child to have no effect to its parent. 

In order to make parent pay attention to child, you can choose one of the following ways:

  • display: inline-block to child
  • float:left to child and one of clearfix tricks to help parent get the correct child width
  • display:table to parent and display:table-cell to child
